name: hostingbe/php-autodiscover-autoconfig
description: PHP program to automatically configure email accounts in IMAP, POP3, SMTP in the email program via autodiscover, autoconfig or configuration profiles for Apple mail. Email programs that are supported are Outlook, Thunderbird, Apple mail, EMclient and other email programs that support autodiscover

authors.name: Constan van Suchtelen van de Haere
